div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 354 Macedonia, c. 1840? (549, 893) Burial: c. 600-590 B.C. (T) Contents: 12+ EL Unc. Asia Minor: fr. (raised square 6, swastika 2, "mask" horse hd. 1, fish hd. 2) Disposition: Sotheby, July 12, 1852, 34-42 Noe 540 (based on Borrell, NC 1841, p. 139) would seem to be part of the same hd. as Noe 893
